column2: an A.M. Eatery////The lines are always long. The wait time is ridiculous and the prices are inflated. The staff is friendly and welcoming. You'll have a better time
column6: and better prices if you choose to skip this place and choose Barnaby's. I've lived in the neighborhood for over 10 years
column7: because of the lines and parking I have only been able to eat at Snooze 3 times. There's literally no parking area for this restaurant.
